name: SetSpacing
description: A tool to set the spacing of an image in each dimension.

inputs.name: Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the image (e.g., 2 or 3).

inputs.name: Input file
inputs.description: The input image file in HDR format.

inputs.name: Output file
inputs.description: The output image file in NII format.

inputs.name: Spacing
inputs.description: Spacing values for each dimension. Requires SpacingX, SpacingY, and optionally SpacingZ.

output-files.name: Output image
output-files.description: The output image with the specified spacing.

author: ANTs developers
